mapper.select: select a.* from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select a.* from users a order by userid) a) a where rn between #{pagesize}*(#{page}-1)+1 and #{pagesize}*#{page}
mapper.insert: insert into users(userId, userNm, pass, reg_dt, alias, addr1, addr2, zipcode, filename, realfilename) values(#{userId}, #{userNm}, #{pass}, #{reg_dt}, #{alias}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{zipcode}, #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realfilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
